New Records: Chris Flexen had a franchise-record 23 straight winless starts.
Key Match Events: The White Sox scored seven runs in an inning for the first time this season.
Chris Flexen pitched a gem to lead the White Sox to a 7-0 victory over the Angels.
Post-Match Reflections: Garrett Crochet expressed his respect and appreciation for the fans' support despite a disappointing season.
Interim manager Grady Sizemore received strong endorsements from players, including Garrett Crochet.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox completed their second three-game sweep of the season, both at home.
The White Sox avoided setting a new record for the highest total defeats in the Modern Era, remaining tied with the 1962 Mets at 120 losses.
